title: Caribbean Jerk Pork Roast
directions: Pat roast dry with paper toweling. Blend seasonings and rub evenly over pork roast. Place in shallow pan and roast at 350°F-180°C for 45-60 minutes, until internal temperature registers 155ºF-75ºF. Remove from oven, let rest 10 minutes (temperature will rise about 5 degrees upon resting). Slice and serve. Wrap leftovers well and refrigerate for tomorrow's sandwiches.
